TopicTitle: Where do you keep your photos used in forum ?

Articles.Content: Hi everyone, I wanted to ask you where do you keep your photos you're using for forum?
I like imgur.com because you can imbed entire albums of phtos and not just one at a time. Very useful for things.

In my spaceship of the imagination?

Sorry, couldn't resist. Imgur.
Same here .... AFAIK Imgur is the most popular photo hoster in this forum
I happen to rent server space from Bluehost which I use for multiple purposes. So I upload my images to there for serving on forums etc.
I simply use the space provided by my ISP. It's part of the package.
I like Imgur's interface and find it easy to use.

I like imgur, I created my account just for KSP. But I would caution against "browsing" imgur, it doesn't seem to have any kind of restriction or moderation.

I have photbuket too, but I like the albums in imgur

Edited September 21, 2014 by Alshain

photobucket

Well someone has to sail against the wind....

I recommend Imgur as well. You don't even need an account. You can also create an album with multiple pictures in it and embed the album straight onto the page so people don't have to load up all the pictures.
Imgur for multi-photo albums where I want to add captions and such, for quick one-off screenshots I use dropbox.
